# children

**Instance Property**

The contents of the menu.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var children: [UIMenuElement] { get }
```

## Discussion

If the menu doesn’t have any child menu elements, this property contains an empty array.

## Accessing child elements

- **replacingChildren(_:)**: Creates a new menu with the same configuration as the current menu, but with a new set of child elements.

items.description: Creates a new menu with the same configuration as the current menu, but with a new set of child elements.
items.name: replacingChildren(_:)
